name: Exceptionals
sheet_description: Sheet appears mostly empty, minimal sample suggests small excerpt of a multi-header financial forecast table containing periods, dates and forecast/actual flags.

tables.table_description: Small 5-column snippet of a wider exceptional-cost forecast vs actual table. Only 5 period columns (Periods 10,4,11,5,6) have been populated in this sheet extract together with date and status header layers and a single cost line (IT Consultancy) plus totals.

columns.column_description: Column representing Period 10 for exceptional cost reporting; header layers include Date Aug-23, marked as Forecast, unit £k.
Column representing Period 4; date Sep-23, unit £k, status Forecast/Actual per multi-header.
Column representing Period 11 with date Jan-24.
Column for Period 5; date Jan-25; status Actual.
Column for Period 6; date Feb-24; status Actual.

row_headers.row_header_description: Column D contains row descriptions such as 'Total Exceptional Costs', 'IT Consultancy'

data_quality.completeness: Sheet highly incomplete; only five period columns and one cost line populated.
data_quality.consistency: Numeric values consistent as currency; headers mixed text with spelling error 'Foreacst'.
anomalies: Sheet truncated—majority of expected periods/rows missing
